Firewall

The President needs help. Who does he call? Hack ! What if the world was run by hackers? The President is looking for help and no help is coming. She had no choice but to call the OCTOPUZ(8 Hackers)desperately asking for their help to sabotage the other opponents. They replied YES!.. Later they realize that this mission isn't for them they may be taking risks for the president but they aren't ready for the lies, death, cheats, and lossâ€¦
